name: His Yellow Eyes (WIP)
description:
Escaping the mistakes of his past, a young man prepares to endure the winter in an isolated cabin in the forest. Far from being alone, however, he is haunted by a strange wolf who seems to want something from him. But is it only a wolf? And is he in greater peril if he holds the wolf close, or keeps it at bay?

❄

His Yellow Eyes is a work of interactive fiction about queer isolation and connection, and also about a man who meets a wolf alone in the woods. Each choice is impactful to a greater or lesser extent, shaping a highly individualized narrative with each playthrough. This game is in active daily development, so don't expect too much, but I hope you enjoy what's there so far!

❄

Cover image (to be revealed) illustrated by the highly talented Flor Rodríguez
